name: Batch Update Media Informations
author: G.Breant

sections.description:
Allows you to update the titles / descriptions / filenames of a several medias in one stretch.
This is particulary handfull when you have a large media library that you need to update.

  • Media IDs can be entered as comma-separated values and ranges (524,527,530-539,…)
  • Option to add add a numeral suffix after the medias titles (…#1, …#2, …#3)
  • Option to rename files if the plugin Media File Renamer is activated

Contributors

Contributors are listed here

Localization
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to your blog and Activate it.
  2. Go to Media > Batch Update Medias Infos.
